item.title: 15 States Poised For ‘Full Halo CME’ Tuesday As Strong Aurora Forecast
item.description: An Earth-directed coronal mass ejection could trigger a G3-rated geomagnetic storm on Tuesday, Dec. 9, according to space weather forecasters at NOAA.

item.title: Google Adopts FBI ‘Take A Beat’ Warning As It Goes To War With Hackers
item.description: What do Google and Kash Patel have in common? They both want you to take a beat and stop hackers in their tracks.

item.title: All The Leaks About Marvel Rivals’ Rogue Ahead Of Her Release
item.description: Rogue will arrive in Marvel RIvals soon as a new Vanguard, and we know about some of her powers and even a famed cosmetic from new leaks.

item.title: 4 Reasons You Apologize Even When You’re Not Wrong, By A Psychologist

item.title: How AI Will Change The Accounting Software Industry In 2026
